trans-unit.source: Represents the smart label properties of an annotation to store.
This class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle> class used for <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle"></xref> class with the specified chart element.
The chart element that this style belongs to.
Gets or sets the back color of the label callout.

This property is only applicable when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle"></xref> property is set to a value of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle.Box"></xref>.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object that represents the back color of the label callout.
Gets or sets the anchor cap style for the label callout line.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> object that represents the anchor cap style for the label callout line.
Gets or sets the color of the label callout line.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object that represents the color of the label callout line.
Gets or sets the style of the label callout line.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> object that represents the style of the label callout line.
Gets or sets the width of the label callout line.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
The width of the callout line.
Gets or sets the callout style of the repositioned smart labels.
This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle"></xref> object that represents the callout style of the repositioned smart labels.
